subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ majority owner, and team officials are expected to meet with Carmelo Anthony. If Anthony declines to meet, then his disinterest is clear.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ majority owner, and team officials are expected to meet with Carmelo Anthony. If Anthony declines to meet, then his disinterest is clear.
